column4: What could you guys advise me when I'm trying to fix my computer after replacing an nvidia card with an ati card?
which ati card?
I tried several things as uninstall nvidia and install fglrx, but now I get the error (EE) can't load fireGL DRM library
well, get to an emergency root terminal with network and remove nvidia* (sudo apt-get purge nvidia*) then install nouveau (sudo apt-get install nouveau)
probably would do it... might want to download/install ati's newest drivers
yeah, that's the free (gpl I think) radeon drivers with 3D acceleration
np
ok... good luck
